page.title: 20HOBBIES
page.content: Our school has 283 pupils and in a survey on{hobbies}the following information was gathered.Many children attended clubs where they took part in {ice skating}(18%){swimming}(18%){ {badminton}(13%){football}(9%){ {gymnastics}(8%){tennis}(7%){dancing (5%) and{karate}(4%).142(50%) had {computers}at home and 85(30%) had a {B.M.X. bicycle.Musical instruments}are played by 103(36%) of the pupils. Several of the pupils attend these organisations{Brownies}11%,{Cubs}11%, {Guides}6%,{Scouts}3%.{Pets}are kept by 218(77%) of the children.Many children made collections of such items as{ {rubbers,pencil sharpeners,football {stickers,badges,postcards,ornaments, {stamps}and{foreign money.}Some children spent time inventing games as well as{reading and writing.}Most children watched{television.
